nodes.title: Leaving A Long-Lasting Legacy: Curating Your Familyâ€™s History
nodes.description: Join us as we tell the story of Jeff Dormish, who wants to pass on his family history to his children as part of his legacy, and how he inspired the Video Translator team.
nodes.coverAlt: Meninggalkan Warisan Jangka Panjang: Mengurasi Sejarah Keluarga Anda

nodes.title: Transcribing A Video: How Do I Know Which Dialect To Choose?
nodes.description: Ever get confused on which dialect you should choose when you are translating a video using our tool? This article will help you choose the right dialect!
nodes.coverAlt: Transcribing A Video: How Do I Know Which Dialect To Choose?

nodes.title: The Implications Of AI Adoption In Our Tools
nodes.description: AI transcription is now a standard feature in productivity toolkits. What does this mean for your business?
nodes.coverAlt: The Implications Of AI Adoption In Our Tools

nodes.title: How NSW Health Is Using Video Translation To Empower Occupational Therapists
nodes.description: Working with developmentally challenged children is very rewarding work. Read how NSW Health is using video translation to help its occupational therapists.
nodes.coverAlt: How NSW Health Is Using Video Translation

nodes.title: Why YouTube Stopped Community Caption Contributions
nodes.description: Community captions are a function in YouTube. This function allows a YouTuber to crowd source captions. YouTube is shutting this down. Here is how it will affect you!
nodes.coverAlt: Why YouTube Stopped Community Caption Contributions

nodes.title: How Vyasa University Is Fighting Covid With Video Translation
nodes.description: Vyasa University is working to raise awareness about Covid-19. Read more about how they used video translation to reach stakeholders across 8 Indian languages.
nodes.coverAlt: How Vyasa University Is Fighting Covid With Video Translation

nodes.title: How QAChef Is Reaching Clients In A Tough Market
nodes.description: QAChef a tech company in hospitality - is using video translation in Chinese and Arabic to gain new clients in a tough climate using marketing localization and marketing internationalization.
nodes.coverAlt: Bagaimana QAChef Menjangkau Klien Di Pasar yang Sulit

nodes.title: How AI Transcription Fails And What To Do About It
nodes.description: the transcription or translation depending upon what you are trying to do. '
nodes.coverAlt: How AI Transcription Fails And What To Do About It: AI Failed Rocketship

nodes.title: How AI Dubbing Will Change Everything: Building A Video Translator
nodes.description:
day we look at two very different approaches to building a video translator,
  first a one shot system including lip syncing. Secondly our own app, and some of
  the design decisions we have taken which are very human centred.
nodes.coverAlt: How AI Dubbing Will Change Everything: Building A Video Translator

nodes.title: One Igbo Woman Trying To Save Her Language
nodes.description:
I remember that we got punished as students for speaking our mother tongue
  which was tagged 'vernacular' at school. That affected the growth of our indigenous
  languages greatly. Read about one woman's journey to save her mother tongue, Igbo
nodes.coverAlt: One Igbo Woman Trying To Save Her Language

nodes.title: How To Reach Gen Z Using AI
nodes.description:
The way younger users consumer video content is evolving and marketers
  need to evolve too. In this post we look at how video content consumption is changing
  and where AI can improve your processes.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Reach Gen Z Using AI

nodes.title: Clients: Why You Make Me Blush!
nodes.description:
A client picked up some bugs in our application. They helped us find
  the source of the bugs. And then they blew us away with their feedback
nodes.coverAlt: Clients: Why You Make Me Blush!

nodes.title: Speaking In The Mother Tongue: AI Indian Languages
nodes.description:
We recently came across an article with the exciting news that the Indian
  government is planning on making its Internet content available in regional languages
  to remove the language barrier among Indians.
nodes.coverAlt: Speaking In The Mother Tongue: AI Indian Languages

nodes.title: Accessibility: Why It Matters And How To Avoid Being Sued
nodes.description:
A hearing impaired couple is suing a hospital for not providing disability
  friendly facilities. Is this justified? How can you avoid being sued for not meeting
  accessibility requirements?
nodes.coverAlt: Accessibility: Why It Matters And How To Avoid Being Sued

nodes.title: On The Brink Of Extinction: Nearly Dead Languages And The Dedicated Linguists   Bringing Them Back To Life
nodes.coverAlt: On The Brink Of Extinction: Nearly Dead Languages And The Dedicated Linguists   Bringing Them Back To Life

nodes.title: Sign Languages: Their past, present and future
nodes.description:
For something that is used by an estimated 70 million people worldwide,
  sign language is pretty important. Going from the past to the future, Google Translate
  is developing a way to translate sign language into speech!
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 30/01/20

nodes.title: Quick Transcribe: For When You Need To Get Transcription Done Quickly
nodes.description:
We introduce the Quick Transcribe functionality. Here we have taken everything
  we learnt about how clients use our app and put it into a single workflow for fast,
  efficient transcription and translation.
nodes.coverAlt: Quick Transcribe: For When You Need To Get Transcription Done Quickly

nodes.title: Mr Sh*thole: What To Do When Your AI Misbehaves
nodes.description:
Facebook's AI got in trouble this week for translating Chinese President
  Xi Jinping name as Mr Shithole. How to avoid AI disasters. Also, your co-workers
  are likely to trust a robot boss over a human one according to Oracle, and this
  might be a good thing.
nodes.coverAlt: Mr Sh*thole: What To Do When Your AI Misbehaves

nodes.title: What Arabic Voices are Available?
nodes.description:
In this article we're looking at our Arabic speaking AI and the different
  voices available. We look at what Male and Female Arabic AI's sound like. Have a
  listen!
nodes.coverAlt: What Arabic Voices are Available?

nodes.title: 3x Increase In Transcription Efficiency
nodes.description:
We achieved a 3x increase in our transcription efficiency using AI. Read
  on to find out how we did this, and what we learnt from changing our procedure.
nodes.coverAlt: 3x Increase In Transcription Efficiency

nodes.title: Happy New Year 2020!
nodes.description:
We had a very good 2019 here at Video Translator. We started to get some
  traction, we found a niche where our tech was useful, and slowly slowly things started
  to come together. We think big things are ahead of us in 2020!
nodes.coverAlt: Happy New Year 2020!

nodes.title: An Old Language Is Young Again...
nodes.description:
Today we look at work in bringing back Tifinagh, the script used to write
  the Amazigh (or Berber) languages of North Africa. We also look at what Comcast
  is doing to provide support in sign language, and why you should invest in people
  when picking a transcription, translation or dubbing commercial partner.
nodes.coverAlt: An Old Language Is young Again...

nodes.title: Changes In The Internationalization And Localization Industry
nodes.description:
Rev.com, an industry leader in the internationalization and localization
  business recently changed its pricing model for transcribers. This change not well
  received inside the industry. What happened, why and how to move forward?
nodes.coverAlt: Changes In The Internationalization And Localization Industry

nodes.title: 60% Of The Content Produced By US YouTubers Is Watched In Other Countries
nodes.description:
Globalisation and the spread of trends beyond national borders is being
  accelerated by platforms like YouTube. One consequence is 60% of the content produced
  by U.S. YouTube creators is watched by users in other countries. Another consequence
  is the merger of the shopping and entertainment categories
nodes.coverAlt: Changes In The Internationalization And Localization Industry

nodes.title: We Just Launched And We Need Luck
nodes.description: We Just Launched And We Need Luck
nodes.coverAlt: We Just Launched And We Need Luck
